alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Jefferson; Mercer; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN MERCER...VENANGO... NORTHEASTERN BUTLER...NORTHEASTERN INDIANA...JEFFERSON...NORTHERN ARMSTRONG...CLARION AND WESTERN FOREST COUNTIES... At 745 PM EDT, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Atlantic to near New Bethlehem to Portage. Movement was east at 15 mph. Locations impacted include... Oil City, Franklin, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Brookville, Knox, Rimersburg, Sugarcreek, New Bethlehem, Tionesta, Enterprise, and Hasson Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 126 and 137. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 30 and 87. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this intense snow shower. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Jefferson; Mercer; Venango
